video.description:
Vegan Pumpkin Coffee Cake with Pecan Crumb! 15 Mins active.
FULL RECIPE : http://www.veganricha.com/2017/09/vegan-pumpkin-coffee-cake-with-pecan-crumb.html

Easy 1 Bowl Pumpkin Cake, topped with Chai Spice/Cardamom Pecan Streusel. Coffee Cake or Chai Cake!
Soft, Spiced, Delicious. Pumpkin Pecan Crumb Cake. Soy-free Recipe.  Gluten-free option. Use othe Squash puree or sweet potato puree for cake variation. 

**Recipes like this in my BOOK, Shipping Worldwide now!: http://www.veganricha.com/vrekaz **

recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 cups flour ((I generally use a mix of Spelt/Wheat and unbleached all purpose))
½ cup powdered vegan sugar ((Use 2 tbsp more for sweeter))
2 to 4 tsp  pumpkin pie spice  (( or 11/2 tsp cinnamon, ½ tsp ginger, ¼ to ⅓ tsp nutmeg, ⅛ tsp cloves))
3 to 4 tbsp chopped walnuts or pecans
1 cup pureed pumpkin (,not pumpkin pie mix)
½ cup non dairy milk ( (almond or soy or lite coconut))
1/2 teaspoon cinnamon or chai spice or a mix of cardamom and cinnamon

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Line a brownie pan with parchment. In a bowl, add all the dry ingredients and whisk well.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Line a brownie pan with parchment. In a bowl, add all the dry ingredients and whisk well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the wet ingredients to the bowl and mix to just about combine. Let it sit for 2 minutes, then mix again to ensure there are no dry flour streaks. Pour the thick batter into the brownie pan. Even it out using a spatula.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the wet ingredients to the bowl and mix to just about combine. Let it sit for 2 minutes, then mix again to ensure there are no dry flour streaks. Pour the thick batter into the brownie pan. Even it out using a spatula.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the Streusel by mixing everything in a bowl with your fingers or a spoon until crumbly, Add a tsp or so more oil if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the Streusel by mixing everything in a bowl with your fingers or a spoon until crumbly, Add a tsp or so more oil if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle all over the cake and evenly spread. Bake the cake for 40 to 45 minutes. Test with a toothpick from the center.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle all over the cake and evenly spread. Bake the cake for 40 to 45 minutes. Test with a toothpick from the center.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool completely before slicing. Serve with turmeric pumpkin spice latte.. For a decadent dessert, add a light drizzle of plain sugar icing.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool completely before slicing. Serve with turmeric pumpkin spice latte.. For a decadent dessert, add a light drizzle of plain sugar icing.
